mapper.update: update t_goods_sku set goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sku_code = #{skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sku_name = #{skuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sku_price = #{skuPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, sku_spec = #{skuSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where goods_sku_id = #{goodsSkuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select goods_sku_id, goods_id, sku_code, sku_name, sku_price, sku_spec, company_id from t_goods_sku
